Company.question: Is there an organizational strategy defined with deliverables and budgeting for creating digital assets such as mobile apps, social campaigns etc?
Do you have an Omnichannel mechanism to capture customer experiences through incidents/feedback/surveys/logs?
Is there a real-time communication channel between your operations(production/customer-support) team and IT/development?
Is there as information model defined for all the key business data flowing at all touchpoints, including outside of the traditional databases?
Does any automated analytics engine give visibility and direction in embracing your customers?

Technology.question: Have you reengineered your IT processes to leverage DevOps?
Do you use Continuous Integration tools like Jenkins?
Do you use ChatBots/ChatOps tools like Slack, Flock etc?
Is there a monitoring/alerting mechanism in place that ties your social handles and IT departments?
What percentage of your enterprise leverages cloud infrastructure (slider 1-100%)
